titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to take steps to cause the exportation, at competitive world prices, of basic agricultural commodities produced in the United States.

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Amends the Agriculture and Food Act of 1981 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to take all feasible steps, including subsidizing exports, to cause the exportation at competitive world prices of U.S. agricultural commodities.
